name: Modify tcpout settings
Modify Any node
authenticate
func:
/**
https://nodered.org/docs/api/admin/methods/post/auth/token/
POST /auth/token
client_id	identifies the client. Currently, must be either node-red-admin or node-red-editor.
grant_type	must be password
scope	a space-separated list of permissions being requested. Currently, must be either * or read.
username	the username to authenticate
password	the password to authenticate
*/

// payload should contain
// node, server, port, username, password
msg.node_settings = msg.payload

msg.url = "http://localhost:1880/admin/auth/token"
msg.method="POST"
msg.payload={
    client_id:"node-red-admin",
    grant_type:"password",
    scope:"*",
    username:"admin",
    password:"s2c0m1c9!"
}

return msg;

authenticate
func:
/**
https://nodered.org/docs/api/admin/methods/post/auth/token/
POST /auth/token
client_id	identifies the client. Currently, must be either node-red-admin or node-red-editor.
grant_type	must be password
scope	a space-separated list of permissions being requested. Currently, must be either * or read.
username	the username to authenticate
password	the password to authenticate
*/

// payload should contain
// node, server, port, username, password
msg.node_settings = msg.payload

msg.url = "http://localhost:1880/admin/auth/token"
msg.method="POST"
msg.payload={
    client_id:"node-red-admin",
    grant_type:"password",
    scope:"*",
    username:"admin",
    password:"s2c0m1c9!"
}

return msg;

name: get gps
add or remove passenger
save location data
func:
/**
 * setup tutorial : https://maker.pro/raspberry-pi/tutorial/how-to-use-a-gps-receiver-with-raspberry-pi-4
 * data ref : https://gpsd.gitlab.io/gpsd/gpsd_json.html
 * 
 * example data
class: "TPV"
device: "/dev/ttyHS1"
mode: 3
time: "2021-01-02T17:46:44.000Z"
ept: 0.005
lat: 18.7503875
lon: 99.044588
alt: 308.8
epx: 5.4
epy: 12.5
epv: 14.4
track: 0
speed: 0.331
climb: 0
eps: 28.99
*/

const p = msg.payload
if(p.class=="TPV"){
    global.set("l_lat",p.lat);
    global.set("l_lng",p.lon);
    global.set("l_speed",p.speed) //mps
    return msg;
}

calculate temperature
func:
const temp = (msg.in_temp_raw + msg.in_temp_offset) * msg.in_temp_scale
msg.payload = temp
global.set('s_temp1',temp)

flow.set("read_temp1",false)

return msg;

name: calculate humid
func:
const humid = (msg.in_humidityrelative_raw + msg.in_humidityrelative_offset) * msg.in_humidityrelative_scale
msg.payload = humid
global.set('s_humid',humid)
flow.set("read_humid",false)
return msg;

name: calculate temperature 2
func:
const temp = msg.in_temp_raw  * msg.in_temp_scale
msg.payload = temp
global.set('s_temp2',temp)
flow.set('read_temp2',false)
return msg;

name: calculate pressure
func:
const pressure = msg.in_pressure_raw * msg.in_pressure_scale * 10
msg.payload = pressure
global.set('s_pressure',pressure)
flow.set('read_pressure',false)
return msg;
